isis.stitle: 8 SPEED, 9 SPEED, AND 13 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON SERIES - AIR SYSTEM - RANGE VALVE A-5010

figure.caption: Figure 8. Range Valve A-5010 Exploded View

step1.para: Remove two screws holding the bottom cover to the valve and slide the cover down the gear shift lever to expose the air line fittings. Disconnect the air lines.
Loosen the jam nut and turn the control valve from the gear shift lever.
Pry medallion from recess in top cover.
Remove the two screws and the top cover from valve housing.
Remove the two screws on the side of valve housing to separate the housing.
Remove the Range Preselection Lever from the left housing and the position balls and guide from the lever.
If necessary, remove spring and O-ring from bores in left housing.
If necessary, remove springs, O-ring and sleeve from bores in right housing.

Refer to Figure 8 for proper reassembly. Use a VERY SMALL amount of silicone lubricant on the O-rings to avoid clogging ports. A small amount of grease on the position springs and balls will help to hold them in place during reassembly.
Re-install the control valve on the gear shift lever and tighten the jam nut.
Attach the air lines and re-install the bottom cover.
